column1: Family and friends may call from 4 to 8 p.m. Monday at Barkes
column2: Weaver & Glick Funeral Home on Washington Street. The funeral will be conducted at 1 p.m. Wednesday at Haskell & Morrison Funeral Home in Vevay with Virgil Clotfelter officiating. Family and friends may call from 5 to 8 p.m. Tuesday and noon to time of service Wednesday at Haskell & Morrison Funeral Home. Burial will be at Vevay Cemetery.
